author: dgaudet
msg: directory_walk() is an expensive function, keep a little more state to
avoid needless string counting.  Add two new functions make_dirstr_parent
and make_dirstr_prefix which replace all existing uses of make_dirstr.
The new functions are a little less general than make_dirstr, but
work more efficiently (less memory, less string counting).

author: dgaudet
msg: Add a "depend" rule that uses gcc -MM to rebuild dependencies.  Also rebuilt

author: dgaudet
msg: PR#372: EXTRA_LFLAGS was changed to EXTRA_LDFLAGS (and LFLAGS was changed
to LDFLAGS) to avoid complications with lex rules in make files.

author: dgaudet

author: dgaudet
msg: run_method optimized to avoid needless scanning over NULLs in the module list
